channel.title: Making npcs (unaggressive) move around
channel.description:
how do i make unaggressive npcs move around?
Also if you play counter-strike 1.6 is there any hack to bypass the latency kicker; Eg; YOU WILL BE KICKED IF YOUR OVER 200ms

item.title: Making npcs (unaggressive) move around
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

In your ‘Autospawn.cfg’, You will see a line like this:

spawn = 1648	3413	3536	0	3414	3537	3412	3535	2

You would change the Four coordinates after the ‘0’, You change this to the X and Y coordinates,
Of either north east and south west, or north west and south east, Not sure which.

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs (unaggressive) move around
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

[quote=“Jesse777, post:2, topic:234792”]go into your autospawn.cfg (or npcspawn.cfg if you have a 508 source)

you would see something like this:

spawn = 175 3250 3392 0 3254 3398 3248 3386 Varrock Mugger at Magic Shop

Npc id

Coordinates
Just 0 forgot why
Walk range
Description

So the orange stuff is 0 change it to your walk range

Good luck[/quote]

The 0 is the Height, meaning if you put it to 1 your NPC would be upstairs. I have also been trying to make my npcs’ walk. Haven’t figured out how, if I do I’ll let you guys know.

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs (unaggressive) move around
item.dc:creator: @Jesse777 Jesse777
item.description:
@Jesse777 wrote:

[quote=“MoparScaperDude, post:3, topic:234792”]As stated. Range X and Range Y. Vertical + Horizontal :)[/quote] are you on a 508?
